ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Recover Meeting Recordings
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Recover Meeting Recordings
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Zoom allows users to recover recordings from trash for up to 30 days from the deletion date. Use this API to recover all deleted [Cloud Recordings](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203741855-Cloud-Recording) of a specific meeting. **Scopes**: `recording:write:admin` `recording:write`
**Prerequisites**: * A Pro user with Cloud Recording enabled.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Recover Meeting Recordings

Zoom allows users to recover recordings from trash for up to 30 days from the deletion date. Use this API to recover all deleted [Cloud Recordings](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203741855-Cloud-Recording) of a specific meeting. **Scopes**: `recording:write:admin` `recording:write` **Prerequisites**: * A Pro user with Cloud Recording enabled.

Method: Put

OperationID: recordingStatusUpdate

EndPoint:

/meetings/{meetingId}/recordings/status
